comment.author: 7471115@N08
comment._content: The ship appears to be the armored cruiser USS Brooklyn (CA-3), judging by the three tall, thin funnels, and the barely visible name on the stern. The Brooklyn also had a main armament of 8x8" guns, so the 8" shells were probably being added to or removed from her magazines.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thank you for the information about the ship.  We will add the information to our source data and reload the description.
